content: sew front flipper make 2 around the shell between the seam and the purl edge on co 10 stitches in green leaving an 8 inch/20 5 cm tail for the shell top to create a ridge as you sew around the body sewing distribute sts across needles as you prefer and join sew through the pinned limbs thus attaching them to the for working in the round underside of the shell round 1 k remove pins and weave in any remaining ends round 2 ssk k2 m1l k2 m1l k2 k2tog repeat rounds 1-2 three more times questions / comments / contact round 9 k round 10 ssk ssk m1l k2 m1l k2tog k2tog 8 sts rebecca olson has been knitting since 2003 round 11 k and writing patterns since 2012 for more strange round 12 ssk k4 k2tog 6 sts critters helpful how-tos and musings on knitting round 13 k please visit www rabbitsandrobots net to get in round 14 ssk k2 k2tog 4 sts touch email hello@rabbitsandrobots net © copyright 2018 by rebecca olson for personal use only 2 www rabbitsandrobots net
